meanings.definition: The act of riding on a toboggan down a snowy hill.
meanings.sent1: We had so much fun tobogganings on the hill yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Tobogganings is a popular winter activity in our town.
meanings.sent3: The children's laughter filled the air as they went tobogganings down the slope.
meanings.sent4: Her tobogganings down the hill were like a swift, joyful dance.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of tobogganings made the cold weather worth it.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of sliding down a hill on a toboggan.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy tobogganings with my friends every winter.
meanings.sent2: Tobogganings requires good balance and control.
meanings.sent3: The annual tobogganings competition always draws a big crowd.
meanings.sent4: His skill in tobogganings was unmatched, gliding effortlessly down the slope.
meanings.sent5: The speed of tobogganings down the hill took my breath away.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in toboggan races or competitions.
meanings.sent1: She trained hard for the upcoming tobogganings event.
meanings.sent2: Tobogganings races are exciting to watch.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated the end of winter with a grand tobogganings festival.
meanings.sent4: His determination in tobogganings competitions earned him many trophies.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the crowd fueled their tobogganings down the track.
